response.job_title: Patent engineer [Asesora de patentes] |  Innovation i+D+i advisor | Patent drafting/translations | Detail-oriented | Team player | Decision maker
response.summary:
A dedicated, committed patent engineer with process specialty (Master's degree) and Scrum Master Certification. More than 6-yrs as a patent examiner at Colombian Patent Office. Focused on innovation and keen eye to detail.

Former project engineer (in biodiesel and bioprocess industry). English and French proficiency. Innovation management, patent examination and patent drafting. Marketing analysis. Negotiations with suppliers. Competent in critical analysis, troubleshooting, leadership and team work. Special preference in technology vigilance, innovation cycles, patent to real life, consulting.
response.skills: Desarrollo de innovación, Patentability prior art searches, Ingeniería mecánica, Litigios de patentes, Vigilancia tecnológica, Preparación de patentes, Búsqueda de patentes, Capacidad de análisis, Process Engineering, Patent examination, Propiedad Industrial, Patentes, Process Simulation, Chemical Engineering, Process Improvement, Nanotechnology, Gestión de proyectos, Ingeniería química, Planificación estratégica, Ingeniería

profile_positions.description: Checking previous state of art (chemical process, cosmetic, textile, oil & gas, food, construction) and legal issues in claims and description in order to make each application follow law.  Discussing patentability with inventors or attorneys. Do novelty and inventive activity analysis and discuss it with inventors through Official Actions. Grant or deny applications.
profile_positions.title: Patent examiner

profile_positions.description: Verificación de control de calidad de materias primas, producto en proceso y producto terminado. Participación en auditorías internas o externas. Mantenimiento y mejoramiento del sistema de gestión de calidad. Actualización de protocolos. Verificación en la formulación de productos, propuestas para su mejoramiento de acuerdo a lineamientos ambientales o de seguridad
profile_positions.title: Product development and quality director

profile_positions.description: Design and making of PFD and P&ID's. Real data process simulation in  Super Pro Designer 9.0 and ASPEN ONE V.8.6 and propose a new process to attach to the old one. Improvements proposals.  Market research and competitive intelligence. Preparing reports to Transfer Technology Offices in Mexico and receive info from them in order to get into the projects.
profile_positions.title: Contractor

profile_positions.description: Traducir y mediar negociaciones entre importadores y exportadores de los sectores: textil, alimentos, manufactura y tecnología.
profile_positions.title: Traductor

company.name: CNRS - Centre national de la recherche scientifique

education.degree_name: Propiedad Intelectual, Conocimientos Tradicionales y Expresiones Culturales Tradicionales

school.name: WIPO ACADEMY - ACADEMIA DE LA OMPI

company.name: ClarkeModet
company.description:
Established in 1879, ClarkeModet is the largest international intellectual property group, offering a One-Stop-Shop IP service in Latin America and Europe. With an operational presence in 13 countries, commercial hubs in the USA and China, and an EPO Desk in Germany, we advise on the most adequate IP strategy according to their business needs in all areas of Intellectual Property to Blue Chip Companies and SMEs, Research and Innovation Centres, Technology Transfer Offices, and Public Organizations.
We combine tradition and innovation with more than 500 professionals specialized in pharmaceuticals, chemistry, biotechnology, mechanical, civil, and industrial engineering, telecommunications, electronics, nanotechnology, and software. 
ClarkeModet is your IP partner for Latin America and an entry point to Europe.
